statements: DELETE FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND subscription_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM CustomerData WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
DELETE FROM messages WHERE customer_id = 123 AND sent_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM messages WHERE sent_date < '2021-12-01');
DELETE FROM messages m USING customers c WHERE m.customer_id = c.customer_id AND c.first_name = 'John';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1 AND first_name = 'John';
DELETE FROM products WHERE price > 1000 AND category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM marketing_messages WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM send_date) = 8 AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com');
DELETE FROM orders WHERE customer_id = ? AND order_date < ?
DELETE FROM orders WHERE quantity < 10 AND order_date < '2022-01-01';
